Articles.Content: So I have been using Raster Prop Monitor for a while now and its one of my favorite mods.The only problem is that the aren't very many mods that make use of it. I was wondering: how easy is it to put a couple of the screens into a modded cockpit? I am not a mod developer and I don't know a ton about code. Would it be something that could be done fairly easily or is the processes a lot harder than what I have envisioned in my head. Again, I'm not a mod developer and only have experience with installing mods and messing around with the config files.
